titleStmt.title: Marsh his mickle monument. Raised on shepherds talkings, in moderate walkings, in divine expressions, in humane transgressions.
titleStmt.author: Marsh, John, writer of verse.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "A. Br: At Greene [?] hith"; "Septemb: 16th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
